comprehensive_overview: qrupdate is a Python library for updating and solving the QR factorization. It provides functions to update a QR factorization of a matrix when new columns are added, as well as solving linear least squares problems based on the updated QR factorization.
core_features:
1. Updating QR factorization with new columns
2. Solving linear least squares problems using the updated QR factorization
3. Fast and efficient computation
4. Compatible with NumPy arrays
